title: Frost Staff
summaries: The Frost Staff is a Hardmode magic weapon that has a 2*1/50 (2%) drop chance from Icy Mermen and Ice Elementals, both of which are found in the Snow biome or Ice biome. The Frost Staff shoots a frost bolt which travels in a straight line, pierces a single enemy, then disappears after striking a second and (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) also inflicts the Frostbite debuff upon contact.
